title: Chamizal National Memorial: Laws & Policies
body: Laws & Policies       Regulations   The Code of Federal Regulations provides a listing of rules and regulations applicable to all National Park Service areas.   The Superintendent's Compendium [pdf 607 KB] provides park-specific regulations enacted under the authority of the superintendent, including rules about the use of alcohol in Chamizal National Memorial.     The possession of firearms is governed by applicable state and federal laws.   Management Plans   Foundation Document (2016) [pdf 3.5 MB] The Foundation Document outlines the purpose of Chamizal National Memorial. The Foundation Document Overview [pdf 1.9 MB] provides some highlights from the complete Foundation Document.   Comprehensive Interpretive Plan (2009 - 2013) [pdf 478 KB] The CIP is a guide for education and visitor services.
